Home → Events and activities → Slaughter in Southwold

Slaughter in Southwold

Saturday 17 and Sunday 18 June 2017

Join us for author talks, food and a quiz at the fifth annual Slaughter in Southwold crime writers' festival.

You can also win prizes in the Slaughter in Southwold raffle and by solving the Slaughter in Southwold 'Whodunnit' puzzle sheet.

Buy tickets for individual events or take advantage of our great value Saturday passes, Sunday passes and weekend passes.

Tickets and passes are also available at Southwold Library or on 01502 722519.

Saturday 17 June

Meet the Author: Paul Harrison
Sat 17 Jun, 1000, £5

Meet the Author: Harry Brett
Sat 17 Jun, 1130, £5

Lunch can be murder, with Rosie's Home Cooking
Sat 17 Jun, 1300, £10

Meet the Author: M. J. Arlidge
Sat 17 Jun, 1400, £5

Meet the Author: Guy Fraser-Sampson
Sat 17 Jun, 1530, £5

Elementary My Dear Watson: fun crime quiz night
Sat 17 Jun, 1900, £3 per person

Sunday 18 June

Meet the Author: Ruth Dugdall
Sun 18 Jun, 1000, £5

Good crime fiction: a contradiction in terms? A discussion between John Nightingale and John Sutherland
Sun 18 Jun, 1130, £5

Lunch: Something Fishy
Sun 18 Jun, 1300, £10 (with fish) £7 (meat/veggie)

Meet the Author: Elly Griffiths
Sun 18 Jun, 1400, £5

Meet the Author: Isabelle Grey
Sun 18 Jun, 1530, £5
